Game.Canvas.name: Game.Canvas
Game.Canvas.description: The main canvas class. Do not change the width and height of the canvas.

params.name: width
params.description: The width

params.name: height
params.description: The height

Game.Image.name: Game.Image
Game.Image.description: Images to be used in your sprites. Please load all your images with awaitImages(array,callback) before actually running any code. All events are outputted to Game.events.on in the awaitImages callback

params.name: url
params.description: The url to the image. This can be in data:image format or an actuall https:// url

Game.SpriteList.name: Game.SpriteList
Game.SpriteList.description: Lists of sprites that can be drawn quickly

params.name: canvas
params.description: The canvas to draw your sprites to

params.name: canvases
params.description: The canvases to draw your sprites to formated in [canvas,canvas,canvas]. If no canvases are given, nothing will be drawn with draw()

Game.Sprite.name: Game.Sprite
Game.Sprite.description: Sprites. The basic object which has your character or monster or npc. It has an X and a Y to be moved around, and can be drawn in the canvas's spritelist

params.name: image
params.description: The first image for the sprite. If this image is given before it is loaded, the sprite WILL NOT load properly. Make sure to load ALL your images before doing anything, or serious errors could occur.

params.name: x
params.description: The starting x position of the sprite

params.name: y
params.description: The starting y position of the sprite

Game.events.name: Game.events
Game.events.description: All the main events for your game to run. Handle any events with Game.events.on(event,callback). Call any events with Game.events.out(event,paramaters...)

Game.GLOBAL.name: Game.GLOBAL
Game.GLOBAL.description: These methods can be accessed directly with Game.[method]

classitems.description: Draw an image onto the canvas
classitems.name: drawImage

params.name: image
params.description: The image to be drawn to the canvas

params.name: x
params.description: The x position to draw the image to

params.name: y
params.description: The y position to draw the image to

return.description: Weather the image drawing succeeded or not. If image drawing did not succeed, it is likley that the image was not loaded yet. Please use awaitImages to house your image loading.

classitems.description: Register a sprite to the canvas's SpriteList
classitems.name: registerSprite

params.name: sprite
params.description: The sprite to be added to the SpriteList

classitems.description: Fired the image loads. Instead of using this event, you can use awaitImages to wait for all images in an array to load.
classitems.name: load

classitems.description: Draw the image to a canvas
classitems.name: drawImage

params.name: canvas
params.description: The canvas to draw the image to (not a RenderingContext2d)

classitems.description: Add a sprite to the SpriteList
classitems.name: addSprite

params.name: sprite
params.description: The sprite to be added to the SpriteList

classitems.description: Draws all the sprites to be updated
classitems.name: draw

params.name: update
params.description: Weather the sprites should have their images updated first. Disabling this can get better performance, only use when neccessary.

classitems.description: When a key is first pressed
classitems.name: keydown

params.name: key
params.description: The key that was pressed formatted according to keys.json (Expect these to be changed)

classitems.description: When a key is let go of
classitems.name: keyup

params.name: key
params.description: The key that was released formatted according to keys.json (Expect these to be changed)

classitems.description: When the screen is resized. Make sure to redraw on this event and reformat your screen.
classitems.name: resize

classitems.description: Called when your game should draw
classitems.name: draw

classitems.description: Called when your game should update
classitems.name: error

params.name: deltaTime
params.description: How long (in seconds) since the last frame. Multiply it by your speed for constant movement (in px/s)

classitems.description: Waits for all the images in an array to load.
classitems.name: awaitImages

params.name: images
params.description: The images to load

params.name: callback
params.description: Called when all the images load
